hero_text: Upload or paste your legal documents to get instant, AI-driven insights — clause detection, risk assessment, and key obligation summaries.
about_text: This platform leverages advanced AI models to analyze legal contracts in real time. It identifies crucial clauses, highlights potential risks, and summarizes obligations, making complex agreements easier to understand for individuals and organizations alike.
no_file_selected: No file selected. Supported: .pdf, .doc, .docx. Max 10 MB.
